item.title: Federal Reserve Governor Cook Faces New Mortgage Fraud Allegations Today
item.description: August 29th: On this day, Mark Pullen, who is the Director of the Federal Housing Finance Agency, once more submitted another criminal charge regarding the third property of Federal Reserve Board Governor Cook in Massachusetts to the Department of Justice. The charge asserts that Cook obtained a mortgage of $361,000 for an apartment in Massachusetts and claimed it as a second home. Eight months later, Cook claimed to have received rental income ranging from $15,000 to $50,000 and classified it as an investment property.Cook may be engaged in Reverse Occupancy Fraud. In this type of fraud, a borrower purchases a property as an investment but initially falsely represents it as a primary or secondary residence in order to obtain a lower mortgage rate or more favorable loan terms. Subsequently, the borrower may change the property's use by declaring rental income to conform to the definition of an investment property.BlockBeats had previously reported that a judge in charge of the case

item.title: Yesterday, the US Bitcoin Spot ETF saw a net inflow of $1.789 billion, while the Ethereum Spot ETF saw a net inflow of $39.1 million.
item.description: On August 29th, as monitored by Farside Investors, the net inflow of the US Bitcoin spot ETF yesterday was $178.9 million, and BlackRock IBIT received a net inflow of $63.7 million.Yesterday, the net inflow of the US Ethereum spot ETF was $39.1 million, marking the 6th consecutive day of net inflow. Among them, BlackRock ETHA witnessed a net inflow of $67.6 million, while Fidelity FETH saw a net outflow of $33.5 million.

item.title: Matrixport appeared at Bitcoin Asia2025 to discuss how Asian institutions are leading the way in seizing new opportunities in Bitcoin.
item.description: On August 29th, Matrixport was extended an invitation to attend the Bitcoin Asia Summit and took part in a panel discussion entitled "Asian Institutions Leading the Commencement of a New Bitcoin Era."During the event, Matrixport's COO, Cynthia Wu, pointed out that the digital asset investment is undergoing a substantial transformation. An increasing number of investors and corporate treasuries are regarding Bitcoin as a long-term asset allocation. They are continuously accumulating rather than engaging in short-term speculation. ETFs and stock tokens have made it more accessible for the general public to invest in digital assets, significantly reducing the learning curve. In just two years, the combined market value of these two has exceeded $260 billion and is approaching the current market capitalization of stablecoins. It can be anticipated that with the proliferation of stablecoins, the market capitalization of Bitcoin still has the potential to grow tenfold in the coming years.

item.title: A new address withdrew 9.32 million WLD from Binance, worth $8.85 million
item.description: August 29th. Based on the monitoring of OnchainLens, a newly established address withdrew 9.32 million WLD from Binance 11 hours ago, with a value of $8.85 million.

item.title: XPL on Hyperliquid Continues to Surge, Breaking $1.1 Mark with a 36% Premium Over Binance
item.description: On August 29th, on Hyperliquid (accessible via https://app.hyperliquid.xyz/join/NTOD), XPL continued to experience a surge and broke through $1.1. The current annualized funding rate stands at an extremely high 254%, with a 36% positive premium compared to $0.808 on Binance.Early yesterday morning, Hyperliquid implemented a new mark price calculation method for pre-market perpetual contracts. The mark price of the contract will utilize the standard mark price formula and be combined with the price of external pre-market perpetual contracts (if available).

item.title: The 219th Ethereum All Core Developers' Meeting Fusaka Development Net Devnet3 is expected to be finalized today
item.description: August 29th, Tim Beiko provided a summary of the 219th Ethereum All Core Developers Meeting (ACDE). The key points of this meeting are as follows:The Fusaka development network Devnet 3 is anticipated to be completed by today. The consensus layer team is actively working on resolving synchronization issues. Provided that everything proceeds smoothly, Devnet 5 will be launched.There are arrangements to deprecate Holesky a few weeks after Fusaka becomes active. A public post will be issued to explain the timetable and migration guide.The Gas Limit target is to reach 60 million prior to the Fusaka upgrade.Glamsterdam Update (in future meetings, the discussion on the PFI matter requested by clients will take precedence) and other matters.

item.title: Canadian company Luxxfolio plans to raise $73 million to expand its Litecoin treasury strategy
item.description: August 29th. As per Decrypt, the Canadian firm Luxxfolio intends to raise $73 million for the expansion of its Litecoin (LTC) treasury strategy. Charlie Lee, the founder of Litecoin, joined its advisory board by the end of June.It is worthy of note that the company reported zero revenue during the second quarter. It had a net loss of $197,000, cash reserves of merely $112,000, and accumulated losses approaching $19 million.

item.title: The Indonesian Web3 platform Hypr has launched a Food & Beverage Investment Exposure based on NFT technology.
item.description: On August 29th, as per Techinasia, the Indonesian investment platform Hypr is presenting global investors with the chance to get involved in Indonesia's local F&B (food and beverage) businesses via profit-sharing investments. Its initial portfolio company is DORÃ© by LeTAO, a Japanese dessert brand renowned for its cheesecakes and having stores in Indonesia. Hypr employs NFT-based smart contracts to safeguard investors' profit-sharing rights. It validates through the ordering system data and distributes profits on a monthly basis. Hypr operates under the supervision of the Indonesian Financial Services Authority (OJK) and holds ISO 27001 and ISO 9001 certifications. By facilitating profit-sharing and smart contracts, Hypr lowers the investment threshold, enabling retail investors to participate in Indonesia's F&B market, which is projected to surpass $51.5 billion by 2024.

item.title: Huobi HTX Ranks Third Globally in Cryptocurrency Exchange Platform Comprehensive Strength Ranking
item.description: On August 29th, based on the latest data from Aicoin, Huobi HTX has demonstrated remarkable performance in the comprehensive strength ranking of cryptocurrency exchanges and has been steadily ranked third globally. In the spot trading ranking, Huobi HTX's 24-hour trading volume reached $32.71 billion, surpassing OKX ($30.73 billion) and closely following Binance and Coinbase Pro. In terms of comprehensive strength ranking, Huobi HTX also ranks third, with a 24-hour trading volume of $56.46 billion, demonstrating its core competitiveness among global mainstream exchanges.It is reported that Huobi HTX has recently been continuously strengthening its platform governance, security compliance, and product experience. With innovative mechanisms such as the comprehensive upgrade of the selective station, zero freezes in the C2C section, and 100% full compensation, it has attracted a large number of users and liquidity inflows. This ranking surge reflects Huobi HTX's steady growth trend in t

item.title: Grvt will be lifting KYC requirements and offering a $50,000 reward to the first 600 users. The TGE is scheduled to launch in Q1 2026.
item.description: August 29th. Based on some user feedback, the decentralized exchange Grvt has now unchained and enhanced the new user registration identity verification experience. The platform has also initiated a $50,000 total new user reward activity.As the industry's first on-chain trading platform to provide -0.01% maker rebates (negative fees) to retail investors, Grvt enables users to not only enjoy lower trading costs but also receive additional rewards through market-making behavior. The platform is constructed on ZKsync, with a focus on privacy and compliance, and is supported by multiple institutions such as Ampersan, Selini, and QCP.It is reported that its token generation event (TGE) is scheduled to take place in the first quarter of 2026, with 20% of the tokens allocated to the community. Meanwhile, the platform's Rewards 1.0 incentive program will come to an end in September, with the early user gains being locked, indicating that it is currently the final opportunity to participate
